actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill relating to withholding by the United States of certain taxes imposed by States, and political subdivisions thereof, in the case of Federal employees.

summary.text: Requires that Federal officials comply with any State or local statute or ordinance providing for the withholding of an income tax from the pay of employees subject to such tax (presently limited to State taxes only). (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5517)

titles.title: A bill relating to withholding by the United States of certain taxes imposed by States, and political subdivisions thereof, in the case of Federal employees.
